mapper.select: SELECT d.deployNo , s.seqNo , s.seqTableNo , c.chainName , c.chainID , d.wtype , d.reqDate , d.reqTime , d.reqServiceId , d.wContent , d.wProgram , p.pageName , d.wSource , d.reqEmpNo , d.wEmpNo , d.deployEmpNo , d.devEmpNo , d.testEmpNo , d.prdEmpNo , d.division FROM deploy d JOIN CHAINTABLE c JOIN PROGRAMTABLE p JOIN SEQTABLE s ON(d.seqtableNo=s.seqtableNo) AND (d.chainID=c.chainID) AND(d.wProgram=p.pageId)

SELECT d.deployNo , s.seqNo , c.chainName , d.wtype , d.reqDate , d.reqTime , d.reqServiceId , d.wContent , p.pageId , d.wSource , d.reqEmpNo , d.wEmpNo , d.deployEmpNo , d.devEmpNo , d.testEmpNo , d.prdEmpNo , d.division FROM deploy d JOIN CHAINTABLE c JOIN PROGRAMTABLE p JOIN SEQTABLE s ON(d.seqtableNo=s.seqtableNo) AND (d.chainID=c.chainID) AND(d.wProgram=p.pageId) WHERE d.deployNo=#{deployNo}
SELECT empNo , empName FROM EMPLOYEE WHERE empName=#{empName}
SELECT chainId ,chainName FROM CHAINTABLE WHERE chainName LIKE CONCAT('%',#{chainName},'%')
SELECT pageId , pageName FROM PROGRAMTABLE WHERE pageName LIKE CONCAT('%',#{pageName},'%')
SELECT seqtableNo , seqNo , chainId FROM SEQTABLE WHERE seqNo LIKE CONCAT('%',#{seqNo},'%')
